main.name: SQLANA
main.description: Have you heard of Sqlana? Sqlana ($SQL) is a next generation meme token born from the anti-SOL sentiment aroused by the repeated downtimes of the Solana Blockchain
main.description2: Trade with the superb scalability of SQL
